maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hey there, Seeker!\. Welcome to the comfy retreat of \c[3]\v[lore.title.faction-wave-jungle]\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Bienvenue dans le confortable refuge des \c[3]\v[lore.title.faction-wave-jungle]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Track blessed us with peace right now.\. Please savor it!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Le Tracé nous fait l'honneur d'être en paix pour le moment.\. Savourez-la !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Ah, a \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Such a pleasant sight, welcome to our snug little retreat!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Ah, un \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Quelle joie d'en voir un. Bienvenue dans notre petite oasis confortable !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: We, \c[3]\v[lore.title.faction-wave-jungle]\c[0], strive to protect the balance and purity of this wonderful habitat that is \v[area.jungle.name].
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Nous, les \c[3]\v[lore.title.faction-wave-jungle]\c[0], faisons ce que nous pouvons pour protéger l'équilibre et la pureté de ce merveilleux habitat qu'est le \v[area.jungle.name].

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Of course, with humanity always expanding, this has become both more and more important and challenging.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bien entendu, avec l'expansion incessante de l'humanité, ce travail devient toujours de plus en plus important et difficile.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Having one as distinguished as a \v[lore.title.seeker] extend their hand to aid us can make a vast difference!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: La main tendue de quelqu'un d'aussi distingué qu'un \v[lore.title.seeker] peut faire une énorme différence !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: In fact, just now we are in need of someone to protect one of ours during a screening of local water sources.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: En fait, nous avons déjà besoin de quelqu'un pour protéger l'un des nôtres pendant une vérification des sources d'eaux locales.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Do you feel ready to assist us and our mission?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Vous sentez vous prête à nous assister nous et notre mission ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Wonderful!\. The investigation is long overdue because of the dangerous location.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Merveilleux !\. L'enquête était attendue depuis longtemps à cause de la dangerosité du lieu.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Meet up with Gardener Linde at the \c[3]Royal Grove\c[0].\. She will be waiting near the teleporter.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Rencontrez la botaniste Linde dans le \c[3]Bosquet Royal\c[0].\. Elle vous attendra près du téléporteur.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Keep her safe so she can work for the well-being of our environment!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Gardez la saine et sauve, pour qu'elle puisse travailler au bien-être de notre environnement !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Bye.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bye.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: That is truly a shame.\. Please come back when you have changed your mind.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: C'est vraiment dommage.\. Revenez ici si jamais vous avez changé d'avis.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Meet Gardener Linde at the \c[3]Royal Grove\c[0] and support her.\. She is waiting near the teleporter.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Rencontrez la botaniste Linde dans le \c[3]Bosquet Royal\c[0] et assistez là.\. Elle vous attendra près du téléporteur.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Ah great, welcome back \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. We already received the water samples and started the examination.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Ah, super, bon retour parmi nous, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Nous avons déjà reçu les échantillons d'eau et démarré les examens.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: The data has been dearly missing.\. Now we can finally get back on track with our work.\.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Les données nous manquaient vraiment.\. Maintenant nous pouvons enfin recommencer notre travail.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Well, it will take some time before we have useable information.\. Maybe we will need your help again, noble \v[lore.title.seeker]!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bien, cela va prendre du temps avant que l'on ait des informations utilisables.\. Peut-être que nous aurons encore besoin de votre aide, noble \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: But for now, please take this reward.\. May the Ancients' bless you!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Mais pour l'instant, prenez cette récompense.\. Que les Anciens vous bénissent !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Track blessed us with peace right now.\. Please savor it!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Le Tracé nous fait l'honneur d'être en paix pour le moment.\. Savourez-la !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], right on cue!\. The water sample you helped to collect has proven to be useful.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], vous venez au bon moment !\. Les échantillons d'eau que vous avez aidé à récupérer, ont été utiles.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: We recently got the results of the test back and the data is definitely worrisome.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Nous avons récemment obtenu les résultats du test et les données sont vraiment inquiétantes.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: An unusual concentration of unfamiliar energy has been found in the water.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Une concentration inhabituelle d'énergie inconnue a été trouvée dans l'eau.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Reports suggest that it is strong enough to influence even larger animals and plants.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Des rapports suggèrent qu'elle est assez puissante pour influencer même des animaux et des plantes plus grands.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: As we speak, infected plants roam \v[area.jungle.name] to spread the disease right into the roots of our beloved forest.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Alors que nous parlons, des plantes infectées se baladent dans le \v[area.jungle.name] pour propager la maladie jusque dans les racines de notre forêt bien aimée.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], will you lend us your aid again, to weed out this threat?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], allez-vous nous aider, pour éviter cette menace ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Excellent!\. You are perfect for this job, I am certain of it.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Excellent !\. Je suis certain que vous êtes parfaite pour ce travail.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Now, we still do not know how the infection started spreading.\. So you should start by eradicating its offshoots.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Maintenant, nous ne savons pas comment l'infection a commencé à se propager.\. Donc vous devriez commencer par éradiquer ses pousses.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: There have been several sightings of \c[3]infected \v[combat.name.jungle/plant]\c[0] in \c[3]Western \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Nous avons reçu plusieurs témoignages parlant d'\c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/plant] infectées\c[0] dans la \c[3]partie ouest du \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: They seem to \c[3]remain hidden near bodies of water\c[0] while drenching the grounds with their infectious energy.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Ils semblent \c[3]rester cachés près des étendues d'eaux\c[0] pendant qu'ils abreuvent les sols avec leur énergie infectieuse.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Though with all that excess energy, you should be able to \c[3]sense them from afar\c[0] with your \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker] analysis\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Mais avec toute cette énergie excédentaire, vous devriez être capable de les \c[3]sentir de loin\c[0] avec votre \c[3]analyse de \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Please hurry and dispose of them.\. Meanwhile, we will try to find the real root of the problem.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: S'il vous plait, dépêchez-vous et occupez-vous d'eux.\. Pendant ce temps, nous allons essayer de trouver la véritable cause du problème.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Bye.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bye.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], please.\. This could have dire consequences for the entire area.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], s'il vous plait.\. Cela pourrait avoir de graves conséquences sur la région entière !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Search for the \c[3]infected \v[combat.name.jungle/plant]\c[0] near bodies of water in \c[3]Western \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Cherchez les \c[3]\v[combat.name.jungle/plant]s infectés\c[0] près des cours d'eaux dans la \c[3]partie ouest du \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: They will try to hide, but with your \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker] analysis\c[0] you should be able to \c[3]sense them from afar\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Ils vont essayer de se cacher, mais avec votre \c[3]analyse de \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] vous devriez être capable de les \c[3]sentir de loin\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], you have done well in isolating the infection!\. Meanwhile, we were able to find the cause of the problem!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], vous avez bien fait en isolant l'infection !\. Pendant ce temps, nous avons été capables de trouver la cause du problème !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Another plant has been found, older and with a much stronger concentration of energy.\. It must be the source!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Une autre plante a été trouvée, plus vieille et avec une concentration en énergie bien plus élevée.\. Cela doit être leur source !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: And now it has taken root in \c[3]Wet Passage\c[0], directly next to central streams of water.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Et maintenant elle semble avoir pris racine dans le \c[3]Passage Mouillé\c[0], juste entre deux rivières centrales.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], you must face it and finally return it to the ground, before the infection starts again.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], vous devez l'affronter et la faire retourner au sol, avant que l'infection ne reparte de plus belle.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: The source of the infection has taken root on \c[3]Wet Passage\c[0], between two rivers.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: La source de l'infection a pris ses racines sur le \c[3]Passage Mouillé\c[0], entre deux rivières.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Go there and destroy it to preserve the forest's balance.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Allez là-bas et détruisez la pour préserver l'équilibre de la forêt.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. You have destroyed it, right?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Vous l'avez détruite, pas vrai ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Fantastic!\. With that threat now banished, my fellow gardeners can swarm out and purify the waters.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Fantastique !\. Avec cette menace maintenant bannie, mes jardiniers peuvent se déployer et purifier les eaux.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: How and where that plant was able to amass such power remains a mystery, but we will investigate the trail.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Comment et où cette plante a été capable d'amasser autant d'énergie restera un mystère, mais nous allons enquêter sur ses traces.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: You, \v[lore.title.seeker], have done truly excellent work!\. Take these rewards and be blessed.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Vous, \v[lore.title.seeker], avez fait un travail vraiment excellent !\. Prenez cette récompense et soyez bénie.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], great to see you again.\. You worked up a fine, respectable reputation here and everywhere.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: C'est bon de vous revoir, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. C'est que vous vous êtes fait une belle et remarquable réputation ici et là.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Lea...
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Lea...

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Having you back could really ease our nerves here.\. Some trouble has been rekindling in the underbrush.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Votre retour ici pourrait soulager un peu nos nerfs ici.\. Il y a à nouveau des ennuis fourrés dans les buissons.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: ... How?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: ... Comment ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Yes, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The corruption you uprooted has returned and now it's even come right to our doorstep.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Oui, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. La corruption que vous avez déracinée est revenue et maintenant elle vient même jusqu'à notre porte.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Will you lend us your aid again, so we can bring back peace and balance once and for all?
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Est-ce que vous allez encore nous prêter main-forte, pour qu'on puisse ramener la paix et l'équilibre une bonne fois pour toutes ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Excellent!\. I knew we could count on your assistance.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Excellent !\. Je savais que l'on pouvait compter sur votre aide.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: We were notified of troubling incidents that gave off a similar energy reading as those corrupted plants you pacified.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: On nous a rapporté des incidents assez troublants à propos d'une signature énergétique similaire à celle des plantes corrompues que vous avez calmées.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: But this time the attacks targeted people as close as the \c[3]City Entrance\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Mais cette fois, les attaques ont visé des personnes directement à l'\c[3]Entrée de la Ville\c[0] !
... !\. Comment ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: That is for you to find out, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Search for anomalies right at the entrance and try to cleanse them.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Ça, vous devrez le découvrir vous-même, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Cherchez des anomalies directement à l'entrée et essayez de les purifier.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Bye.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bye.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], please.\. This is a matter of critical importance.\. It might even threaten the entire city!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], s'il vous plait.\. C'est une affaire de la plus haute importance.\. Cela pourrait même menacer la ville entière !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Investigate the \c[3]outside entrance of the city\c[0] and look for anything that could cause the disturbance.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Enquêtez à l'\c[3]entrée extérieure de la ville\c[0] et cherchez tout ce qui pourrait causer les perturbations.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Go meet \c[3]Linde\c[0] on the \c[3]Isle of Legend\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.beach.name]\c[0] and help her extract it!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Allez rencontrer \c[3]Linde\c[0] sur l'\c[3]île de Légende\c[0] à l'\c[3]\v[area.beach.name]\c[0] et aidez-la à en extraire !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], good to see you! The salt has been delivered and prepared!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], ravi de vous voir ! Le sel a été livré et préparé !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Fascinating how much power is stored in this substance..\. This should even cleanse that toxic spirit.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Fascinant de voir la quantité d'énergie stockée dans cette substance...\. Cela devrait pouvoir purifier cet esprit toxique.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.note: and provide the world with safe nuclear energy ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: However, your support is still needed, \v[lore.title.seeker].
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Mais votre aide est encore requise, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Meet up with Linde at the entrance of the city.\. She will cleanse the ghost while you protect her.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Rencontrez Linde à l'entrée de la ville.\. Elle va purifier le fantôme pendant que vous la protégerez.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Meet!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Rencontrer !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Indeed, together with her you will bring back peace to this city.\. We are counting on you.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Effectivement, ensemble, vous allez ramener la paix à cette ville.\. Nous comptons sur vous.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Go meet \c[3]Linde\c[0] at the \c[3]city entrance\c[0]. Together you must lay the toxic spirit to rest!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Allez voir Linde à l'\c[3]entrée de la ville\c[0]. Travaillez ensemble pour que cet esprit toxique repose en paix !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Hey, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. There's our savior, returning from her legendary deed!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Voilà notre sauveur, revenant de son acte héroïque !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: There is no need for this humble silence, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. You have truly done great.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Il n'y a pas besoin de cet humble silence, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Vous avez vraiment bien travaillé.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Lea.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Lea.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: There is no telling what would have happened later, if no one had taken care of this infectious unrest.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Dieu sait ce qui serait arrivé si personne ne s'était occupé de ce trouble contagieux.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Now it is up to us citizens to prevent something of this kind from ever happening again.\. By leading healthier, less wasteful lives.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Maintenant il revient à nous, citoyens, de faire en sorte que ça n'arrive plus jamais.\. En menant une vie meilleure, moins dispendieuse.

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: I am sure even the mayor will agree.\. He is a pragmatic man, who would not want such a catastrophe to repeat.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Je suis sûr que le maire sera d'accord avec moi.\. C'est un homme pragmatique, qui ne voudrait jamais qu'une telle catastrophe se répète.
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.note: we get it, nuclear is dangerous, blah blah blah

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], you have my thanks.\. Please always consider yourself a friend of this city.\. Take care!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], vous avez mes remerciements.\. Considérez-vous toujours comme un ami de cette ville.\. Soyez prudents !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Claude Reynes
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Claude Reynes

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. The Track blessed us with peace right now.\. Please savor it!
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Le Tracé nous fait l'honneur d'être en paix pour le moment.\. Savourez-la !

maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/faction-greens.text: [acquiesce]
